entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:19 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Drizzle or showers beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
